definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: The Industrial cluster is a topic popularily concerned in the academic world either in our country or abroad in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 产业集群是近年来国内外学术界关注的一个热点话题。

sentences.english: This is a two-node cluster, and you have a third system that will be your administrative console.
sentences.chinese: 这是双节点集群，并且你有另外系统作为管理终端。
为什么创建混合式集群？

sentences.english: At this point, the cluster is ready to run jobs.
sentences.chinese: 至此，这个集群应该准备好可以运行作业了。

sentences.english: B-Tree operations tend to be limited to a single cluster.
sentences.chinese: 型树操作往往被限制在单一的集群中。

sentences.english: Selecting the primary option installs a primary node and creates a cluster.
sentences.chinese: 选择主选项会安装一个主节点并创建一个集群。

sentences.english: Concord produces medium-sized clusters bearing large, blue-black berries.
sentences.chinese: 协和生产中小型轴承大集群，蓝黑色浆果。

sentences.english: The port economy and industrial cluster are the keywords of the RSEDZ's charm.
sentences.chinese: 港口经济和产业集群是乳山经济开发区的魅力关键词。

sentences.english: Step 4 is where we find new centroids for the clusters.
sentences.chinese: 第四步是我们找到了集群的新形心。

sentences.english: Your program will have to explicitly establish a connection to another cluster member.
sentences.chinese: 您的程序需要显式地建立一个与另一集群成员的连接。

sentences.english: Berries are medium in size on medium, well-filled clusters.
sentences.chinese: 浆果是对中等中等大小，以及充满集群。

sentences.english: The previous homogeneous illustration depicts a simple two instance cluster.
sentences.chinese: 前面的同构图例描述了一个简单的两个实例集群。

sentences.english: Choose the server or cluster to add the bus from the drop down menu.
sentences.chinese: 从下拉菜单中选择要添加到总线的服务器或集群。

sentences.english: Clustering and high-availability architectures are often found in these types of large enterprise environments.
sentences.chinese: 在大型企业环境中，常常有集群和高可用性架构。

sentences.english: Install the application to the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 将应用程序安装到集群中。

sentences.english: Therefore messages on the Destination can be processed by both cluster members.
sentences.chinese: 因此目的地上的消息可同时由两个集群成员处理。

definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
depth (from front to rear)/depth (into a territory)/span (of time)/(fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)
